title: I cannot send or receive multimedia messages, why? How can I solve this problem?
answer:
Failed to send multimedia messages 

  The network is busy or signals are poor. 

 Try later. 

  The multimedia message center rejects the request. 

 − The number of the recipient is incorrect. 

 Correct the recipient number and send the multimedia message again. 

 − The size of the multimedia exceeds 300 KB. 

 Limit the size of the multimedia message to 300 KB and send it again. 

  The charge is overdue. 

 Pay your bill and try again. 

 Failed to receive multimedia messages 

  Your phone's available storage space is insufficient. 

 [Free up your phone memory and keep the free space greater than 300 KB.]()
